# AI Drone Simulation Project Instructions

This is a React application that simulates an AI drone command and control system for demonstration to potential investors.

## Project Structure
- Left panel: Chat interface for communicating with AI drone
- Right panel: Interactive map showing real-time drone location and flight path
- Drone camera simulation view
- Real-time command processing and response system

## Development Guidelines
- Use modern React with hooks and functional components
- Implement responsive design for professional presentation
- Focus on smooth animations and real-time updates
- Prioritize user experience and visual appeal for investor demo
- Use clean, professional styling suitable for LinkedIn sharing

## Key Features
- Real-time chat with simulated AI drone responses
- Interactive map with drone position tracking
- Flight path visualization
- Simulated camera feed from drone perspective
- Command processing with realistic delays
- Professional UI suitable for investor presentation

## Technical Stack
- React 18+
- Modern CSS or styled-components
- Map library (Leaflet or similar)
- WebSocket simulation for real-time updates
- Responsive design principles
